ps2.6:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye.
ps2.6:1.3_0: Tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi—
ps2.6:2.3_0: Yo cāyaṁ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṁhito;
ps2.6:2.4_0: yo cāyaṁ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṁhito.
ps2.6:2.5_2: ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
ps2.6:3.1_2: majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati?
ps2.6:3.4_2: majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
ps2.6:4.1_0: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ.
ps2.6:4.4_0: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccaṁ—
ps2.6:4.5_0: yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṁ—
ps2.6:4.7_0: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ—
ps2.6:4.8_0: yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo.
ps2.6:4.9_0: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ—
ps2.6:5.2_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:6.2_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:7.2_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ sacchikātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:8.2_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ bhāvetabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:9.1_2: imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṁ tiparivaṭṭaṁ dvādasākāraṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ na suvisuddhaṁ ahosi,
ps2.6:9.1_5: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ.
ps2.6:10.1_2: imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṁ tiparivaṭṭaṁ dvādasākāraṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ suvisuddhaṁ ahosi, athāhaṁ,
ps2.6:10.1_4: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ.
ps2.6:10.3_0: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
ps2.6:11.2_0: Attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
ps2.6:12.1_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne āyasmato koṇḍaññassa virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi—
ps2.6:13.1_0: Pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke bhummā devā saddamanussāvesuṁ—
ps2.6:13.2_0: “etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena
ps2.6:13.2_1: vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
ps2.6:13.3_0: Bhummānaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā cātumahārājikā devā saddamanussāvesuṁ …
ps2.6:13.4_0: cātumahārājikānaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā tāvatiṁsā devā …pe…
ps2.6:13.10_0: “etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena
ps2.6:13.10_1: vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
ps2.6:14.1_0: Itiha tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttena yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi.
ps2.6:14.2_0: Ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi,
ps2.6:14.2_1: appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamma devānaṁ devānubhāvanti.
ps2.6:15.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi—
ps2.6:15.4_0: Iti hidaṁ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa “aññāsikoṇḍañño”tveva nāmaṁ ahosi.
ps2.6:16.1_0: “‘**Idaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccan’**ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi,
ps2.6:18.1_0: Cakkhuṁ dhammo, ñāṇaṁ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:18.2_0: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:18.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:18.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:19.1_0: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:19.2_0: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:19.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:19.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:20.1_0: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṁ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṁ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.
ps2.6:20.2_0: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:20.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:20.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:21.1_0: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:21.2_0: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:21.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:21.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:22.2_0: pariññātanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi,
ps2.6:24.1_0: Cakkhuṁ dhammo, ñāṇaṁ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:24.2_0: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:24.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:24.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:25.1_0: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:25.2_0: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:25.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:25.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:26.1_0: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṁ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṁ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.
ps2.6:26.2_0: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:26.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:26.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:27.1_0: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:27.2_0: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:27.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:27.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:28.1_0: Dukkhe ariyasacce pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṁsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:29.1_0: “‘**Idaṁ dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccan**’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:29.4_0: pahīnanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:30.1_0: Dukkhasamudaye ariyasacce pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṁsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:31.1_0: “‘**Idaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccan**’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:31.4_0: sacchikatanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:32.1_0: Dukkhanirodhe ariyasacce pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṁsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:33.1_0: “‘**Idaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan**’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:33.3_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ bhāvetabban’ti …pe…
ps2.6:33.4_0: bhāvitanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:36.1_0: “‘Ayaṁ kāye kāyānupassanā’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:36.3_0: Sā kho panāyaṁ kāye kāyānupassanā bhāvetabbāti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:36.4_0: bhāvitāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:37.3_0: ayaṁ dhammesu dhammānupassanāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:37.5_0: Sā kho panāyaṁ dhammesu dhammānupassanā bhāvetabbāti …pe…
ps2.6:37.6_0: bhāvitāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:38.1_0: “‘**Ayaṁ kāye kāyānupassanā**’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:38.3_0: sā kho panāyaṁ kāye kāyānupassanā bhāvetabbāti …pe…
ps2.6:38.4_0: bhāvitāti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi,
ps2.6:40.1_0: Cakkhuṁ dhammo, ñāṇaṁ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:40.2_0: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:40.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:40.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:41.1_0: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:41.2_0: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:41.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:41.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:42.1_0: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṁ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṁ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.
ps2.6:42.2_0: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:42.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:42.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:43.1_0: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:43.2_0: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:43.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:43.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:44.1_0: Kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhāne pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṁsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:45.3_0: **ayaṁ dhammesu dhammānupassanā**ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:45.5_0: sā kho panāyaṁ dhammesu dhammānupassanā bhāvetabbāti …pe…
ps2.6:45.6_0: bhāvitāti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:48.3_0: So kho panāyaṁ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:48.4_0: bhāvitoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:49.5_0: So kho panāyaṁ vīmaṁsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti me,
ps2.6:50.1_0: “‘Ayaṁ **chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo**’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:50.3_0: so kho panāyaṁ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti …pe…
ps2.6:50.4_0: bhāvitoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi,
ps2.6:52.1_0: Cakkhuṁ dhammo, ñāṇaṁ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:52.2_0: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:52.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:52.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:53.1_0: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:53.2_0: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:53.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:53.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.

ps2.6:54.2_0: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:54.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:54.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:55.1_0: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:55.2_0: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:55.3_0: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:55.4_0: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:57.3_0: ayaṁ **vīmaṁsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo**ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:57.5_0: so kho panāyaṁ vīmaṁsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti …pe…
ps2.6:57.6_0: bhāvitoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:59.1_0: Catūsu iddhipādesu saṭṭhi dhammā, saṭṭhi atthā, vīsatisataniruttiyo, cattālīsañca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:60.1_2: vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:60.3_2: vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:60.5_0: Vipassissa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:61.5_0: kassapassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:61.7_2: kassapassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:61.9_0: Kassapassa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:62.1_2: gotamassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:62.3_2: gotamassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:62.5_0: Gotamassa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:63.1_0: Sattannaṁ bodhisattānaṁ sattasu veyyākaraṇesu sattati dhammā,
ps2.6:64.1_0: “‘Yāvatā abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:64.3_0: cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:64.4_0: Abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:65.4_0: yāvatā sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:65.6_0: cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:67.1_0: “‘Yāvatā khandhānaṁ khandhaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:67.3_0: cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:67.4_0: Khandhānaṁ khandhaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:68.4_0: yāvatā asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:68.8_0: Asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:70.1_0: “‘Yāvatā dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:70.3_0: cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:70.4_0: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:71.3_0: yāvatā maggassa maggaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:71.7_0: Maggassa maggaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:72.1_0: Catūsu ariyasaccesu sataṁ dhammā, sataṁ atthā, dve niruttisatāni, cattāri ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:73.1_0: “‘Yāvatā atthapaṭisambhidāya atthapaṭisambhidaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:74.3_1: ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:74.7_0: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:75.1_0: Catūsu paṭisambhidāsu sataṁ dhammā, sataṁ atthā, dve niruttisatāni, cattāri ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:76.1_0: “‘Yāvatā indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṁ, ñātaṁ diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāya.
ps2.6:76.5_0: Indriyaparopariyattañāṇe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:77.5_0: yāvatā anāvaraṇaṁ ñāṇaṁ, ñātaṁ diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāya.
ps2.6:77.7_0: cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:77.8_0: Anāvaraṇe ñāṇe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:78.1_0: Chasu buddhadhammesu diyaḍḍhasataṁ dhammā, diyaḍḍhasataṁ atthā, tīṇi niruttisatāni, cha ñāṇasatāni.
